Texts.Chs:
它被认为仅仅只存在于传说之中，直到它的配方在4000年后被人们发现。
^cyan;+^white;30%^pink;辐射^cyan;抗性^gray;(^white;持续5m^gray;)
^red;-^white;5%^red;HP^gray;(^white;持续220s^gray;)
^blue;疯癫+^white;3^reset;
Texts.Eng:
Thought to exist only in legend, until the recipe was found after 4000 years.
^cyan;+^white;30% ^pink;Radiation ^cyan;Res ^gray;(^white;5m^gray;)
